rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may provision. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]
Whenever you provision, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text:
[i]“See the many splintered trees and crater-like footprints? These are subtle hints that the beast
we seek has recently come this way.”[/i]
